c74object.name: fl.untag~
c74object.digest: Retrieves vectors from a tagged frame according to a specified set of tags.
c74object.description: Each output deals with one tag and outputs vectors at the input with that tag. Outputs will be empty if the tag is not present at the input with a vector value. The number of outputs can be set explicitly by parameter. Alternatively, it can be set implicitly by the tag parameters present at instantiation.

entry.name: 1. /num_outs [instantiation int]
entry.description: Sets the number of outputs (and hence the number of tags).

entry.name: 2. /tag_01 [string]
entry.description: Sets the tag related to output 1.

objarg.name: tag_01
objarg.digest: Sets the tag related to output 1
objarg.description: Sets the tag related to output 1.

method.name: frame
method.description: Used internally by FrameLib connection routines. User messages have no effect

method.name: sync
method.description: Used internally by FrameLib connection routines. User messages have no effect

attribute.name: rt
attribute.description: Sets the realtime state for this object

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Sets the context name for this object
